name: Gulfam Ansari
summary: I have over 6 years of experience in designing and building tech products and have extensive knowledge of UI/UX and user psychology. Iâ€™m now looking to leverage my expertise to work on challenging problems as a Senior Software Engineer.

work_experience.about_company: Acko is an insurance company that provides health insurance, auto insurance, and electronics insurance.
tasks: Contributed to the development of Acko's customer-facing mobile application, leveraging my expertise in enabling new users to seamlessly enroll themselves in the system.

Designed and implemented the entire ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) flow within the Acko app, enabling end users to seamlessly create their ABHA ID. Developed and Designed the front-end architecture of a highly-functional internal dashboard that streamlined the process of creating new policy plans, add-on covers, etc.
Mentored junior engineers and conducted code reviews to maintain high coding standards and ensure code quality.

work_experience.about_company: Paytm is a fin-tech company that caters to all your cash needs in a digital world along with shopping, travel booking, etc.
tasks: Migrated the entire codebase of 24*7 support vertical from native code(Android/iOS) to a common ReactJs codebase.

Integrate and Enabled Freshworks ChatBOT for Customer support for all business units of Paytm including Paytm Payments Bank, UPI, Wallet, Recharge & Utilities. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to identify key requirements and ensure the support section met the needs of all stakeholders.
Streamlined the localization process by implementing automation which reduced the need for manual operational effort.

Optimized the performance of the support section vertical in the Paytm app by leveraging the power of the Chrome Lighthouse tool. Identified and resolved all performance-related issues identified by the Lighthouse tool, including removing unused code and loading React components asynchronously.

work_experience.about_company: Elucidata is a product-based company that builds software packages, provides customized solutions, and analyzes omics datasets to understand the molecular basis of cellular phenotypes.
tasks: Contributed to an internal dashboard that enables data scientists to visualize large omics datasets with ease.
I worked extensively with various charting libraries such as D3.js and Plotly.js to create dynamic and visually appealing charts for scientists to visualize large omics datasets.
Created common private NPM packages, which were shared across the development team to improve efficiency and save development time.

work_experience.about_company: DroidTechKnow is a Blogging Website that provides tech-based articles to its readers.
tasks: DroidTechKnow was originally a solo project, created and managed entirely by myself. During the initial stages, I personally authored all the articles on the blog.
Continuously enhance our platform with innovative features that aid in expanding our readership.
We attract around 50K users organically who appreciate our engaging articles.

educations.collage: University School Of Information and Communication Technology

projects.name: ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account)
projects.description: Successfully integrated the ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) feature into Acko's mobile applications, facilitating seamless creation of ABHA IDs for end users.

projects.name: Help and support
projects.description: I was a member of the Paytm 24/7 Help vertical team, where I contributed to the development of the Paytm help support system for end customers on both iOS and Android platforms

projects.name: Tech Blogging platform
projects.description: Developed my own tech blogging platform to publish tech articles, commencing in 2017. Authored numerous engaging tech articles aimed at providing valuable insights and knowledge to the audience.
